documents.document:
Nokia N76 Red Bluetooth GSM Cell Phone

Intelligent inside, dynamic outside. The Nokia N76 is a revolution in one-touch technology. Shoot high-resolution images, play thousands of songs, and connect instantly to the web- without ever opening your device. Upload and share via Flickr. Search and surf with advanced web navigation. The Nokia N76 is the multimedia computer that lets you do it all - and with personal color options, tempered glass, and mirrored steel, you'll stand out doing it.

Nokia Asha 302 Grey Qwerty GSM Cell Phone

Nokia Asha 302 is an affordable Symbian-powered handset which will soon debut in the market with some spicy features. The Nokia Asha 302 is full QWERTY phone and runs the first Symbian Series 40 operating platform. The unique thing about this version of Symbian OS is that it comes with “Mail for Exchange” support. Nokia Browser also comes pre-loaded in this perfect smartphone and serves the business audience perfectly. The premium quality brushed aluminum is used in making the Nokia Asha 302 that renders this otherwise economical handset a classy and expensive feel. The 2.4 inches touchscreen display is ideal for doing every activity on this phone. It is very well complemented by the full physical QWERTY keyboard. There is on-board memory of 100 MB and 128 MB RAM and it also has the 32 GB external memory. Nokia Asha 302 delivers striking performance, thanks to its embedded 1 GHz core processor.

Moto Z3 Rizr Blue Slider CellPhone

This Motorola has imbibed unique slider design in this unlocked GSM phone. This dynamic international phone comes with a complete package of innovative technology. What’s unique about this unlocked phone is all features are active whether this slider-phone is in open or closed position.Unlocked [i]Motorola MOTO RIZR Z3[/i] is an elegant phone with sleek design and narrow-slider form factor built in rich finish and material. It’s imbibes a unique set of eye catching features. In this cell phone a powerful 2 megapixel digital camera has been integrated along with a high-intensity camera. There are also landscape ViewFinder and dedicated side-camera key in this unlocked cell phone, making it easier to use like a digital camera.For all music lovers also the unlocked Motorola MOTORIZR Z3 makes an ideal choice as it supports numerous music-formats. There are a couple of other interesting features incorporated in this unlocked quad-band phone like 1GB of Microsd Slot, USB 2.0 connectivity for easy file transfers and data access, messaging via SMS, IMS, MMS, EMS, e-mail, 20MB of on-board user memory, video capture and playback. Besides, there is mobile phone tools support available for PC synch of media and phonebook.

LG Optimus L3 E400 Unlocked GSM Cell Phone

LG Optimus L3 E400 is a new budget friendly Android based smartphone. It carries a 3.2-inch TFT capacitive touchscreen display with a resolution of 240 x 320 pixels. It has rocking Android 2.3 Gingerbread operating system with a powerful processor. It is powered by 3.15 MP camera on the rear with autofocus and Geo-tagging function. It has external memory slot for adding extra memory up to 32GB via micro SD/SDHC cards. It comes with 3G connectivity, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPRS and GPS.

Motorola EX119 Dual Sim WiFi GSM Cell Phone

Motorola EX119 Brea which is a dual SIM GSM compatible. The device operates on GSM Quad band network frequency. The Motorola EX119 Brea providing a both Touch screen and Type QWERTY keypad. This handset features 2.4-inchs of TFT touch screen display that delivers 320×240 pixels resolution support for bright and clear content viewing. Motorola EX119 Brea will allow you to enjoy your favorite’s tracks with multi format Music Player and FM radio with RDS & recording feature. The 3.0 mega-pixel camera with digital zoom provides a decent picture quality. The phone has a 64 MB of RAM, 128 MB internal memory and Micro SD slot enables you to expand a memory up to 32GB for providing ample of storage space. The connectivity in the handset is offered through GPRS, EDGE, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, WAP Browser and USB. The phone runs on a 1400 mAh Battery that providing a talk time up to 4 hours and 200 hours in standby.

Sony Ericsson R800a XPERIA Play GSM Phone

[i]Sony Ericsson[/i] has announced the relaese date of their Android PlayStation phone, known as Xperia Play smartphone. According to Sony Ericsson's Facebook page, The new Xperia Play is made for the damn PlayStation game lovers. This smartphone will give access to PlayStation Suite. It has dedicated gaming keys and control console that makes it an exclusive gaming phone. Sony Ericsson Xperia Play will run on Google Android 2.3 Ginergerbread OS powered by a 1GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon processor and Adreno 205 GPU. Xperia Play offers 4 inch touchscreen, a 5-megapixel camera at rear that is capable of capturing HD video. Other features include WiFi, Bluetooth and 512 MB RAM. Sony Ericsson has posted a new ad video for the launch of Xperia Play smartphone.

Blackberry Curve 8520 White GSM Smartphone

BlackBerry Curve 8520 is the first RIM device that will be able to sync iTunes playlists, personal info, organizer memos etc. with Mac-running computers. The release of the new version of the BlackBerry Desktop Manager in September will enable that kind of functionality for the rest of the company's product line. The QWERTY-enabled 8520 packs a 65K-color landscape QVGA TFT display. It has quad-band GSM/GPRS/EDGE support as well as Wi-Fi connectivity and a built-in GPS receiver. A 2 megapixel snapper, Bluetooth and USB. Click the specification tab for the complete list of noteworthy features.

HTC T-Mobile myTouch 3G GSM Cell Phone

The more you get to know the T-Mobile myTouch 3G, the better it gets to know you. You can customize almost everything on this phone, and stay in sync with all your Google™ apps and accounts. Make your phone your own. Choose from lots of themes, skins, wallpapers, menus, and icons. Experiment with longTouch to open up even more options. Work without being at work. ActiveSync® makes it easy to use your work e-mail address from anywhere. Come on, get app-y. Choose from thousands of apps on the Android Market™—like Sherpa, a search app that gets to know your tastes over time. Stay synced with Google. Sign in with your Google account for fast access to Google Talk™, Google Maps™, Search, Calendar, and Gmail.

Samsung T919 Behold Rose Gsm Phone at deals2give

The Samsung T919 Behold has officially come to T-Mobile and offers a full touch-screen mobile handset that isn’t Android, and takes advantage of the AWS 3G network. The Samsung T919 Behold features the TouchWiz interface, a 5 megapixel camera with video capabilities, along with a full HTML browser with haptic feedback and is expected to command a price tag of $149.99 on agreement and due out on 10th of November. Following after the Samsung Behold is the Samsung Gravity, a candy-bar design mobile handset with a concealed side slide full keyboard for the mobile texters and will hit on November 17th with a price tag of $49.99 with 2 year agreement.

Motorola U6 PEBL Orange GSM Cell Phone

Finally, Motorola has come up with a mobile phone that provides the best of look and performance blended into one. This phone has been designed in a smooth oval form and innovative dual-hinge mechanism. It facilitates the user to open and close the device and that too in a single swift. The handset can be referred to as a true mobile accessory.What more exciting about this phone is its sophisticated look. The discreet hi-tech capabilities include video playback and capture. The Bluetooth wireless feature is the main attraction about this phone. It allows you to transfer your files to family and friends within a short period of time. The Motorola U6 PEBL orange (unlocked) makes sure that all your daily travel requirements are taken care of. There is a lot to enjoy behind this beautiful design.The best part is that this phone comes unlocked for use. This means that you can use it with your following existing SIM card or service provider. If you love entertainment and want to click the best of photographs, the phone comes equipped with an integrated digital VGA camera with 4x digital zoom and light. Motorola U6 PEBL orange (unlocked) comes with the best video playback and video capture option. Another awesome feature of this phone is the speaker independent speech recognition.

Nokia C5-03 Grey Touchscreen GSM Cell Phone at cellhut

The Nokia C5-03 offers all the features you need to stay connected and entertained. This affordable smart phone offers WLAN connectivity, a 5MP camera and a 3.2" touch screen. Access your favorite contacts with one touch, directly from the home screen. Discover new places and share your location through Facebook. Download the latest apps, themes and more from Ovi Store. And take advantage of voice-guided walk and drive navigation (free from Nokia) with Ovi Maps.

LG Optimus L5 E610 Android GSM Smartphone

The LG L5 E610 is designed to fit comfortably in hands, it has a 4.0 inch screen at the front and a physical home button below the screen along with two capacitive touch keys. The L-Style series, the L5 measures 118.3 x 66.5 x 9.5 mm, runs Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich, and features a 4 inch HVGA (480 x 320) display, HSDPA, Wi-Fi, GPS, NFC, 5MP rear camera, 800MHz processor, 512MB of RAM, 4GB of internal memory, and MicroSD card support. In some markets (Asia and Latin America), the Optimus L5 will have dual SIM capabilities.

Unlocked LG OPTIMUS T P509 THUNDER BURGANDY T-Mobile Best De

LG Optimus T, powered by Android 2.2, with its 3.2" touchscreen, is just right— especially for Smartphone newbies. Optimus T features Google Voice™ Actions, so tasks like online search, shopping, and music are an easy voice command away. What’s more, Optimus T has the ability to connect to Wi-Fi® hotspots, or when no hotspot is available, it can share its innate internet connection with other devices.LG Phoenix unlock are many! You will be free to use your phone with any network provider in any country around the world, as long as it’s a GSM network, that’s the most important benefit you’ll get, letting alone the fact that you will avoid expensive roaming fees when travelling abroad and you will greatly increase the value of your phone.

LG Optimus T Full Bling White Hearts on Hot Pink Snap-On Faceplate Cover: Need something to brighten up your LG Optimus T? We have the perfect solution for you! Introducing our Full Bling Diamond Cases, studded with colored crystals that are arranged to make a particular design.

Buy Unlocked Motorola MOTOKEY 3-Chip EX117 GSM Cell Phone Fo

Enjoy the various features on the MOTOKEY 3-Chip EX117: the socially adept, Tri-SIM enabled phone -granting the user the ability to separate their personal and professional life, while on the go. Featuring a dedicated Facebook key, this Motorola phone lets you easily do what you love best... Social networking. You can browse the Web, capture or record your cherished moments with the 2 Megapixel camera, and use the full QWERTY Keyboard on this EX117 phone that makes texting a breeze.

1.This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
2. GSM Quad Band 2G 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 - SIM 1, SIM 2 & SIM 3
3. Triple SIM; Dedicated Facebook Button; 2 MP Camera; MP3/MP4 Player
4. Full QWERTY Keyboard; microSD card slot for expandable memory up to 32 GB
5. TFT/Color Display; SMS, MMS, Email, IM; Stereo FM radio; WAP 2.0/xHTML Browser

Best Buy Unlocked LG Incite CT810 GSM Camera Phone

The LG Incite is an attractive touch-screen phone with Windows Mobile 6.1. Features include a whole host of productivity and multimedia features like Microsoft ActiveSync, Office Mobile, and a 3-megapixel camera. It offers both Wi-Fi and HSDPA connectivity. Call quality was good.Measuring 4.21 inches long by 2.2 inches wide by 0.55 inch thick, the LG Incite is one of the shiniest handsets we've ever seen; its display is reflective when idle, similar to the one on the LG Shine, and the Incite's entire chassis has a mirror finish. You will definitely have a tough time trying to get fingerprint smudges off the phone, and there's no need for a self-portrait mirror next to the camera, as the handset's surface itself can act as a mirror. Like most touch-screen handsets, the Incite has a minimalist appeal: it is sleek and slim, with few external controls. It's also quite lightweight at 4.23 ounces, so it won't weigh you down, either.

Features:

Display: 262K color touch screen LCD with haptic feedback and accelerometer. Screen size diagonally: 3.0". Resolution: 240 x 400, supports both portrait and landscape modes.
Battery: Lithium Ion rechargeable. Battery is user replaceable. 1300 mA.
Performance: 528MHz Qualcomm MSM7201A CPU. 128 MB built-in RAM. 256 MB Flash ROM with ~70 megs available.
Size: 4.21 x 2.2 x 0.55 inches. Weight: 4.23 ounces.
Phone: GSM quad band 850/900/1900/2100MHz with EDGE. Triband 3G HSDPA 850/1900/2100MHz.
Camera: 3.0 MP with autofocus lens.
Audio: Built in speaker, mic and 3.5mm standard stereo headphone jack. Voice Recorder and Windows Pocket Media Player 10 included for your MP3 pleasure.
Networking: Integrated WiFi 802.11b/g and Bluetooth 2.0 +EDR. Profiles include headset, handsfree, DUN/PAN and A2DP.
Software: Windows Mobile 6.1 Professional operating system.
Expansion: 1 SDHC microSD card slot.

SAMSUNG GOOGLE NEXUS S UNLOCKED GSM PHONE

Samsung Google Nexus S is an Android smartphone running the Android v2.3 Gingerbread OS. The Nexus S comes with Super Clear LCD display. The Samsung Google Nexus S is powered by an 1 GHz ARM Cortex A8 processor, coupled with PowerVR SGX540 dedicated Graphics Processing Unit (GPU) for smoother video playbacks and HD gaming support.The Gingerbread OS builds upon existing Android capabilities like multi-tasking and Wi-Fi hotspot and throws in an improved keyboard and faster web navigation. feature allows the Google Nexus S to read information from objects that have NFC chips embedded in them (posters, stickers, t-shirts etc).Google has made a few tweaks to the stock UI appearance. The notification bar along the top of the screen and the background on the menu have gone a shade darker. Google claims this to be a power saving tactic and will make a marked improvement in battery efficiency. Google Nexus S sports a 5 MP autofocus camera supported by an LED Flash. Additionally, the Nexus S has a front facing secondary VGA camera.

LG Optimus TrueHD LTE P936 Unlocked Android Smartphone

TheLG Optimus True HD LTE is the same model as the P936, a phone already available in Korea, Japan, US and Canada under several different names: Nitro HD (on AT&T), Spectrum (on Verizon) and simply Optimus LTE for most of the remaining markets.The smartphone integrates a 4.5in True HD IPS display with a 1,280 by 720 pixel resolution, an 8-megapixel camera and a 1.5GHz dual-core processor, from the Snapdragon family.Optimus True HD LTE runs on Android 2.3.6 Gingerbread - with a strong promise that it will get an Ice Cream Sandwich upgrade - while packing a 16GB microSD card. The phone also comes with T-DMB connectivity, while having both HSPA+ and LTE support."With the Optimus True HD LTE, we want customers to understand that LTE isn't just about the network and that all LTE phones are not alike", said Dr.Jong-seok Park, President and CEO of LG Electronics Mobile Communications Company.LG has announced that the popular Optimus True HD LTE will be launched on European and Asia continents soon, with Germany, Portugal, Sweden, Singapore and Hong Kong being the first markets to receive the mobile.Although an official release date hasn't been stated, the smartphone will first be launched in countries with LTE networks in the first period. LG has confirmed to ITProPortal that it currently has no plans to bring the Optimus True HD to the UK, but it will support LTE with a number of phones, when 4G rolls out in Blighty.

LG Xpression C395 Unlocked AT&T Qwerty GSM Cell Phone

LG launched his new phone with slider qwerty keyboard,LG C395 Xpression has 3.2-inch color TFT touchscreen display, Bluetooth, 2 MP camera and FM radio is a candybar phone. LG C395 Xpression awful lot of the camera configuration, is unique. Facing the back of a 2MP camera. If we talk about performance, this 2.4-inch TFT display that offers 240 x 320 pixels. The LG Xpression C395 v2.0 microUSB, Bluetooth and battery backup features, etc.

Unlocked Samsung C3330 Champ 2 Silver

SAMSUNG has come up with a new and trendy music phone known as Samsung CHAMP 2. The phone has an attractive sleek Metallic Finish and modern Design. It has 2.4 inches QVGA full touch screen Display and with its compact size and glossy back cover adds that extra by making it look stylish.With a home screen page that is extendable up to 7 pages, users can enjoy different Apps to choose from. The homepage comes with 13 different important widgets for easy access to multiple Apps to choose from. 2 MP Camera captures those precious moments you don’t want to let go, MP3 Player and FM Radio plays your favorite tunes and important news one wants to be updated about.Bluetooth 3.0 enables us to connect wirelessly easily and share the desired images, music and videos. With it USB 2.0 makes it possible to transfer data easily between devices and PCs. With upgraded social network features like ChatOn offers us to connect to our friends and dear ones through FaceBook, Twitter, Yahoo Messenger and GTalk.

Unlocked Sony Ericsson Xperia PLAY

The Android smartphone with everything you need, and the one thing you want. Sony Ericsson's Xperia Play is the long awaited PlayStation phone, tailored towards those who want to combine hardcore gaming with a high-quality handset. Push the springed screen upwards and you uncover familiar PlayStation-style controls, complete with a pair of shoulder buttons, which is comfortable to hold for extended gaming sessions. The Xperia Play comes with some quality games pre-installed and a new PlayStation app that gives access to the PlayStation Suite, Sony's new gaming platform and download store that promises to bring PlayStation games to Android 2.3 and above handsets. The Xperia Play will massively boost Android's gaming credentials.It isn't just about the Playstation controls though; the Xperia Play comes with an excellent 4 inch 854 x 480 pixel resolution multitouch LCD screen. There's also stereo speakers, and a 5 megapixel camera with sharp pictures, as well as a front facing camera for video calls and pictures. Sony Ericsson have used the Android operating system (Gingerbread) for a superb mobile experience and plenty of goodies, including access to the tens thousands of apps in the Android Market and Google Maps.

UNLOCKED NOKIA LUMIA 710 SABRE WINDOWS 7.5 SMARTPHONE

Nokia Lumia 710 offers an accessible entrance to Windows Phone, enhanced with features that bring Nokia’s great strengths to bear. It’s a bright and fashionable phone, offering customization through exchangeable back covers and thousands of apps. It comes in black and white varieties, with the choice of black, white, cyan, fuchsia and yellow back covers. The 3.7-inch screen offers an 800 x 480-pixel resolution with a ClearBlack TFT for great colors and readability even in bright sunlight. At the rear, there’s a five-megapixel auto-focus camera with an LED flash. The camera can also shoot HD video at 30 frames-per-second. It’s designed for social, offering full integration of Facebook, Twitter and Linked-In, and photo-sharing can be done in just a couple of taps. The Internet experience on the Nokia Lumia 710 is powered by Internet Explorer 9, offering excellent performance and compatibility with a wide range of modern HTML5 web apps. Added to the Windows Phone software package is Nokia Drive, offering free turn-by-turn navigation and the latest version of Nokia Music featuring MixRadio which offers hundreds of locally-relevant music channels. Also on board is the Xbox Live Hub for gaming and Outlook Mobile for corporate email accounts.

UNLOCKED BLACKBERRY PEARL 8110 PINK GSM CELL PHONE

BlackBerry Pearl 8110 Pink main features include a 2 Megapixel camera, Built in GPS, Email, Bluetooth and Includes 14 day trial of Carphone Warehouse Navigator. This sexy pink colour is something that a loved one would really like, not only the colour will excite but this smart phone for personal use and business use has a clever keyboard which will help you with emails, the trackball is fantastic as well because it makes light work to navigate through the handsets features.The battery of the mobile gives a standby time of 15 days and a talktime of 3.5 hrs. So, it is possible to use the BlackBerry Pearl 8110 Pink for a long period of time after recharging it once.

Unlocked Motorola MILESTONE 2 GSM Cell Phone

The Motorola Milestone 2 can be used as a 3G mobile hotspot enabling up to five WiFi enabled devices to connect simultaneously. This makes it possible to setup a network virtually anywhere with the benefit of Internet access.The Milestone 2 is simply an upgrade of the original. It's a bit of a brick, but its feature list is impressive: a 480x854 screen, 5-megapixel camera with dual-LED flash, QWERTY keyboard, 8GB of internal storage and a 1GHz processor.The improved QWERTY keyboard features larger keys and better tactility for easier typing, making communication quick and convenient.The latest version of Motorola’s MOTOBLUR is included making it now even easier to manage all your emails, messages and social network updates in one convenient place. It features additional filtering abilities, the capability to resize widgets,enhanced corporate security and a versatile battery manager.With the Motorola Milestone 2 you can record and playback High Definition 720p video. Enabling life’s special moments to be captured in crystal clear detail and with the 8GB internal memory there is plenty of space to store the high quality videos and pictures and any other media too. Abode Flash Player 10.1 is included bringing the desktop experience to mobile users. Websites with rich content can be viewed the way they were meant to be, including videos.

Unlocked LG KP215 GSM Cell Phone

LG Aries KP215 is for the mid-end class without any new cell phone technology such mp3 player or more. LG Aries KP215 is also do not support 3G. This network is dual band only. But beside the lack this phone is good looking with clamcell style. LG Aries KP215 has a VGA camera. For the weight it is light enough just only 80 grams.You can surf the net on the cell phone via 2.0 WAP browser. The LG KP215 Cell Phone is equipped with Dual LCD display screens, external 96X64 pixels 65536 colours CSTN LCD display screen and internal 1.77â€? 128X160 pixels 262144 colours TFT LCD display screen. It supports Java platform.It features EMS (Enhanced Messaging Service) and MMS (Multimedia Messaging Service). You can store games, pictures, ringtones and animations in the provided 4MB internal memory.

LG KP215 Cell Phone featured:
300K resolution digital camera with video recorder/playback and digital zoom function
MP3/MPEG4/AAC/AMR player
FM radio
Internal antenna
Speakerphone
Call vibration
Voice recording function
64 bit MP3/MIDI polyphonic ring tone
